Name: 14 Days of Desire
About the game: Embark on a journey of connection and step family bonding with 14 Days of Desire. After your father's remarriage, your new parents have graciously provided this opportunity for you to spend two weeks getting to know your new step family in a unique and special way. This will be an experience you will never forget, as you create lasting memories and strengthen the bond between you and your new step family members. Whether you're exploring new places, trying new activities or just enjoying each other's company. With many locals eager to interact, you have the freedom to select the individuals you wish to spend your time with, fostering deeper connections and maximizing the benefits of your vacation. You are sure to make unforgettable moments during this 14 day vacation. So pack your bags and get ready for an adventure that will bring your new family closer together.
